name: sshprivatekey
text: Install SSH key pair\nPrivate Key: %1\nPublic Key: %2
shortDescription: Run a command as either the user pi or the root user.
longDescription: This block allows you to enter a command, which will be run on the command-line. You can choose for youc command to be run either as the normal 'pi' user, or for commands that require administrator rights, the 'root' user.
